sections.heading: What is 何 (nani/nan)?
sections.content:
何 means "what" in Japanese. It has two readings: なに (nani) and なん (nan) , and the choice depends on what follows.

何ですか？(なんですか) "What is it?" 何を食べますか？(なにをたべますか) "What do you eat?"

sections.heading: When to Use なに (nani) vs なん (nan)

children.heading: Use なん (nan)
children.content:
Before certain sounds and in specific patterns:

Before です/だ:

何ですか？(なんですか) "What is it?" 何だ？(なんだ) "What is it?"

Before counters:

何人？(なんにん) "How many people?" 何時？(なんじ) "What time?" 何月？(なんがつ) "What month?" 何日？(なんにち) "What day?"

Before の:

何の本？(なんのほん) "What book?" / "What kind of book?" 何の映画？(なんのえいが) "What movie?"

In set phrases:

何色？(なにいろ) "What color?" 何曜日？(なんようび) "What day of the week?"

children.heading: Use なに (nani)
children.content:
Before particles を, が:

何を食べますか？(なにを) "What do you eat?" 何が好きですか？(なにが) "What do you like?" 何か問題がありますか？(なにか) "Is there any problem?"

Before する:

何をしますか？(なにを) "What will you do?" 何をしていますか？(なにを) "What are you doing?"

Standalone:

何？(なに) "What?"

children.heading: Asking "What"
children.content: 何ですか？ "What is it?" これは何ですか？ "What is this?" あれは何ですか？ "What is that?"

children.heading: What + Verb
children.content: 何を食べますか？ "What do you eat?" 何を見ますか？ "What do you watch?" 何をしますか？ "What do you do?" 何を買いますか？ "What will you buy?"

children.heading: What + が + Adjective
children.content: 何が好きですか？ "What do you like?" 何がほしいですか？ "What do you want?" 何がいいですか？ "What is good?"

children.heading: What kind of
children.content: 何の本ですか？ "What (kind of) book is it?" 何の映画を見ますか？ "What (kind of) movie will you watch?" 何の仕事をしていますか？ "What (kind of) work do you do?"

children.heading: Time
children.content: 何時ですか？ "What time is it?" 何時に起きますか？ "What time do you wake up?" 何分かかりますか？ "How many minutes does it take?"

children.heading: People
children.content: 何人いますか？ "How many people are there?" 何人家族ですか？ "How many people in your family?"

children.heading: General
children.content: 何個ありますか？ "How many (pieces) are there?" 何本ですか？ "How many (long objects)?" 何枚ですか？ "How many (flat objects)?"

children.heading: 何か (nanika) - Something/Anything
children.content: 何か食べますか？ "Will you eat something?" 何か飲み物はいかがですか？ "Would you like something to drink?" 何か問題がありますか？ "Is there any problem?"

children.heading: 何も〜ない (nanimo~nai) - Nothing
children.content: 何も食べていない "Haven't eaten anything" 何もわからない "Don't understand anything" 何もない "There's nothing"

children.heading: 何でも (nandemo) - Anything/Everything
children.content: 何でもいい "Anything is fine" 何でも食べる "I eat anything" 何でもできる "Can do anything"

children.heading: 何と (nanto) - How/What
children.content:
Expresses surprise:

何と美しい！ "How beautiful!" 何ということだ！ "What a thing!" / "Oh no!"

children.heading: Example 1: Restaurant
children.content: A: 何を食べますか？ "What will you eat?" B: ラーメンを食べます "I'll eat ramen" A: 何味がいいですか？ "What flavor is good?" B: 醤油味がいいです "Soy sauce flavor is good"

children.heading: Example 2: Daily Activities
children.content: A: 今日は何をしますか？ "What will you do today?" B: 映画を見に行きます "I'll go to see a movie" A: 何の映画ですか？ "What movie?" B: アクション映画です "It's an action movie"

children.heading: Example 3: Shopping
children.content: A: 何を探していますか？ "What are you looking for?" B: プレゼントを探しています "I'm looking for a present" A: 誰へのプレゼントですか？ "A present for whom?" B: 母へのプレゼントです "A present for my mother"

children.heading: Mistake 1: Wrong reading
children.content: Wrong pronunciation: 何を (なんを) ❌ Right: 何を (なにを) ✓ "What (object)" Wrong pronunciation: 何ですか (なにですか) ❌ Right: 何ですか (なんですか) ✓ "What is it?"

children.heading: Mistake 2: Using を with です
children.content: Wrong: 何をですか？ ❌ Right: 何ですか？ ✓ "What is it?"

children.heading: Mistake 3: Forgetting particle
children.content: Incomplete: 何食べますか？ ⚠️ Better: 何を食べますか？ ✓ "What do you eat?"

children.heading: 何の仕事
children.content: 何の仕事をしていますか？ "What work do you do?" お仕事は何ですか？ "What is your job?"

children.heading: Didn't catch what was said
children.content: 何ですか？ "What (did you say)?" 何と言いましたか？ "What did you say?" もう一度お願いします "One more time please"

children.heading: Food
children.content: 何を食べますか？ "What do you eat?" 何が好きですか？ "What do you like?" 何味がいいですか？ "What flavor is good?"

children.heading: Activities
children.content: 何をしますか？ "What do you do?" 何をしていますか？ "What are you doing?" 何をしたいですか？ "What do you want to do?"

children.heading: Preferences
children.content: 何が好きですか？ "What do you like?" 何がほしいですか？ "What do you want?" 何色が好きですか？ "What color do you like?"

children.heading: Casual
children.content: 何？ "What?" 何してる？ "What are you doing?" 何食べる？ "What will you eat?"

children.heading: Polite
children.content: 何ですか？ "What is it?" 何をしていますか？ "What are you doing?" 何を食べますか？ "What will you eat?"

children.heading: Very Polite
children.content: 何でしょうか？ "What might it be?" 何をなさっていますか？ "What are you doing?" (honorific)

children.heading: Basic Questions
children.content: これは何ですか？ "What is this?" 何を食べますか？ "What do you eat?" 何が好きですか？ "What do you like?" 何時ですか？ "What time is it?"

children.heading: With Activities
children.content: 今何をしていますか？ "What are you doing now?" 週末は何をしますか？ "What will you do on the weekend?" 何の本を読んでいますか？ "What book are you reading?"

children.heading: With Preferences
children.content: 何色が好きですか？ "What color do you like?" 何の映画が好きですか？ "What movies do you like?" 何が食べたいですか？ "What do you want to eat?"

children.heading: Common Phrases
children.content: 何か飲みますか？ "Will you drink something?" 何もわかりません "I don't understand anything" 何でもいいです "Anything is fine" 何と言いましたか？ "What did you say?"

sections.heading: Related Grammar Points
sections.content: Question Words (5W1H) - Overview Counters - Using 何 with counters か (ka) - Question particle Yes/No Questions - Question formation 何か/何も/何でも - Something/nothing/anything Particles - を, が with question words
